name: Pvpminecraftplugins
tagline: A group of simple Minecraft plugins that work with ScriptCraft to add a few epic features to your PVP server!
body:
# PVPMinecraftPlugins A group of simple Minecraft plugins that work with ScriptCraft to add a few epic features to your PVP server! ## An up-to-date list of plugins included: PlayerJoinMessage
PlayerRespawned ## Dependencies ScriptCraft
These plugins (like ScriptCraft) work with any Bukkit/Spigot server. ## Installation Install ScriptCraft, download the zip file above, and extract the .js files to your server's ScriptCraft plugin directory:
To find your server's ScriptCraft plugin directory, visit your server's root folder, then go to /plugins/ScriptCraft/plugins.
Each plugin may require you to look at the code, and change it as necessary (just use common sense) e.g. if there is a line of code that says [Your Message Here], then replace it with a message of your choice.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
